attributes.action: demand that all children are taught by a fully qualified teacher or supply teacher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children have the right to be taught by fully qualified teachers or fully qualified supply teachers.  It is very disappointing that many lessons or days are 'covered' by teaching assistants.  Children deserve to be taught by people who have trained in their respective fields.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " demand that all children are taught by a fully qualified teacher or supply teacher."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15200.asp
